metadata.name: First In, Last Out (GIF)
metadata.description:
Laser installation art created in LaserLewDude's closet using lasers, glass and mirrors.  
Glass sculpture (Being) made by p0ng aka @r0bp  
GIF created from raw video. 

Not a render.

Setup Details: 
2x 1W Laser Cubes hung from above the camera, bouncing off 1st surface mirrors suspended above the centerpiece downward to a mirror placed behind centerpiece, and finally back towards camera at an upward angle (gold beams). 

There are 2 1st surface mirrors BEHIND to the immediate L+R of the being that are being used "passively" (no beams hitting them directly). 

The 2 1st surface mirrors converging around the being's head are glued to crystal pillars. 2 50mm glass balls...sitting there. 

1st surface mirrors salvaged from rear projection TVs.
